Title: Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1974 Quartz Brown Leather Watch DGS00142/06
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1974 Quartz Brown Leather Watch DGS00142/06 RRP £470.00 Now £295.00 Description Handmade in Switzerland, this men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1974 Quartz real leather strap watch features rose gold plating surrounding the rectangular watch case. It’s antique-inspired appearance its heightened by the warm tones of the real leather brown strap complementing the rustic hues of rose gold, and emphasised further by the black Roman numerals on the dial indicating the hours. The dial, in contrast, is white, featuring a rose gold edged subdial at six o’clock and a slim date window at three. A black minute track surrounds the dial, with blue iridescent hands indicating the time accurately. Beneath the twelve o’clock position, the Dreyfuss & Co. logo sits, written in black with rose gold plating. The strap is fastened with a rose gold plated buckle, with the watch face being protected by a layer of sapphire crystal glass. The inner workings of this men’s leather strap watch is guaranteed to meet the Dreyfuss & Co. Seafarer Standard. It also comes with a two year manufacturer’s warranty and will be sent in Dreyfuss & Co. presentation packaging.
